code: import styles from"./Piechart.module.css";import Card from"../UI/Card";import{Pie}from"react-chartjs-2";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Piechart=function Piechart(props){var sum=0;var arr=[];var i=0;props.data.forEach(function(arrayItem){if(arrayItem.amount!=="0"){arr[i]=arrayItem.name;}var val=arrayItem.amount_usd;sum+=parseInt(val);i++;});console.log(arr);var state={labels:arr,datasets:[{label:"Rainfall",backgroundColor:["#fac534","#f59c17","#fce731"],hoverBackgroundColor:["#fac534c7","#f59c17c4","#faf61ca8"],data:[90000,50000,70000],radius:"80%"}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:styles.box,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:styles.first,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.total,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Total Value"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["$",sum]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:styles.sec,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Piechart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:state,options:{title:{display:true,text:"Assets Distribution",fontSize:20},legend:{display:true,position:"right"}}})]})]});};export default Piechart;
